text: Emily Marcia Armstrong (born May 6, 1986) is an American singer and co-founder of the band Dead Sara. In September 2024, she became the lead singer of Linkin Park, after Chester Bennington, who passed away in 2017. == Discography == With Dead Sara * The Airport Sessions (2008) * Dead Sara (2012) * Pleasure to Meet You (2015) * The Covers (2017) * Temporary Things Taking Up Space (2018) * Ain't It Tragic (2021) With Linkin Park * From Zero (2024) == References == Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:LGBT people from California Category:Linkin Park members Category:Singers from Los Angeles
title: Emily Armstrong
